hero.title: Resultados reales, no solo líneas de código
hero.description: Hola, soy Dante Vilchez. Me dedico a desarrollar soluciones web de principio a fin: desde el backend que no ves al frontend que te enamora. Me apasiona construir cosas útiles, limpias y que no exploten (muy seguido). ¿Un plus? Tengo sentido del humor incluso cuando hay bugs.

projects.title: Proyectos destacados
projects.description: Aquí se muestran algunos de mis proyectos recientes que muestran mis habilidades y experiencia en desarrollo web.

projects.title: The Joint - Smoke shop
projects.description: Landing page for The Joint smoke shop that consistently attracts approximately 200 monthly visitors since its launch on August 1, 2024. This sustained traffic represents over 1,400 total visitors since launch, providing The Joint with continuous digital visibility in their local market. The design has maintained steady engagement over 7+ months, demonstrating its lasting effectiveness and reliability.

projects.title: Budget Buddy
projects.description: Intuitive expense tracker designed to help users monitor and categorize their daily expenses. The platform provides a comprehensive dashboard with clear visualizations to enhance financial awareness and promote better spending habits.

projects.title: Sarita
projects.description: Developed a responsive website for Sarita's Flower Shop, integrating dynamic product displays and interactive contact forms, resulting in a 50% increase in customer inquiries within the first two months. Enhanced user experience, reducing bounce rate by 49% and increasing page views by 66% through intuitive navigation, faster load times, and mobile optimization.

skills.title: Habilidades técnicas
skills.description: Tecnologías y herramientas con las que trabajo para crear experiencias web modernas

about.title: Sobre mí
about.description: Soy un desarrollador web apasionado por crear experiencias digitales...

contact.description: ¿Estás interesado en trabajar juntos? Siéntete libre de contactarme a través del formulario de contacto o conecta conmigo en las redes sociales.
